backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining chapters, verses, moods, and query APIs for retrieving Gita data and mood‑based verse suggestions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old chapter data to the new chapter structure with summary and keyInsights fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI/UX features, affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human‑written summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file related to UI, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/docs/APP_STRUCTURE_AND_FLOWS.md: Documentation outlining app architecture, navigation flows, component roles, and backend API surface.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme definitions establishing the pink background and purple accent system.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell implementing tab navigation, scroll restoration, theming, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Text and voice message composer with speech-to-text integration and send controls.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatSafetyM: Modal warning users that the chat is not therapy and offering safety guidance.
Renders chat messages with support for verses and follow‑up questions.
frontend/src/components/chat/FollowUpQue: Shows suggested follow‑up questions as clickable buttons.
frontend/src/components/settings/ThemeTo: Toggles between light and dark UI themes.
frontend/src/components/today/TodaysWisd: Displays today’s verse or a loading/empty state with a back button.
Expandable verse card showing Sanskrit, translations, interpretation, and an action step.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides login, identity state, and management using Internet Identity and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching chapters, verses, curated content, and chatbot responses from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Browser speech‑to‑text hook handling recognition lifecycle and transcript updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme with localStorage persistence and DOM updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers, defines light/dark theme CSS variables, global styles, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/DiscoverPage: Displays mood options and navigates to detailed mood views or chat based on user selection.
frontend/src/pages/Discover/MoodDetailVi: Shows curated verses for a selected mood with loading states and an option to start a chat.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, navigation buttons, theme toggle, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterDetai: Loads and displays chapter metadata and its verses with skeletons during fetch.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ChapterListV: Lists all chapters with search filtering, a 'Today’s Wisdom' button, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/ReadGitaPage: Manages navigation between chapter list, chapter detail, verse detail, and today's wisdom views.
frontend/src/pages/ReadGita/VerseDetailV: Fetches and displays a single verse with a back button and loading skeleton.
frontend/src/pages/TalkToKrishna/TalkToK: Implements the Krishna chat page with mood-aware messaging, session history, chatbot responses, and UI for thread display and safety modal.
frontend/src/state/sessionContext.tsx: Provides React context for storing mood and session message history with setters and reset utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations for the app’s design system.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s overall goals, constraints, architecture notes, existing features, and design rules for the Gita Saar app.
